snippet: The tennis fan on the receiving end of Michael Llodra's racial slurs said, "Just issuing a fine is not going to do it - it's not going to stop him or anybody else."
abstract: The tennis fan on the receiving end of Michael Llodra's racial slurs said, "Just issuing a fine is not going to do it - it's not going to stop him or anybody else."

headline.main: Target of Llodra's Racial Slur Says Fine Is Not Enough
headline.print_headline: Slur Brings Fine, But No Apology
